games.name: PUBG: Battlegrounds
games.description: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG) is an online multiplayer battle royale game.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: Fortnite is a popular online multiplayer battle royale game known for its building mechanics.

games.name: Apex Legends
games.description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale game set in the Titanfall universe.

games.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
games.description: Call of Duty: Warzone is a free-to-play battle royale game mode in the Call of Duty series.

games.name: H1Z1
games.description: H1Z1 is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by Daybreak Game Company.

games.name: Ring of Elysium
games.description: Ring of Elysium is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by Tencent Games.

games.name: Garena Free Fire
games.description: Garena Free Fire is a mobile battle royale game developed by 111 Dots Studio.

games.name: Rules of Survival
games.description: Rules of Survival is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by NetEase Games.

games.name: Knives Out
games.description: Knives Out is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by NetEase Games.

tournament.name: Battle Royale Showdown
rules: Players must be at least 13 years old to participate.
Matches will be played in Battle Royale mode.
Points will be awarded based on placement and eliminations.
Cheating or exploiting glitches will result in disqualification.

tournament.name: Aggressive Battlefield
rules: Teams must consist of exactly four players.
Matches will be played in Erangel, Miramar, or Vikendi maps.
Points will be awarded based on squad survival time and kills.
Using third-party cheats or hacks will result in immediate disqualification.

tournament.name: Grand Prix Racing
rules: Competitors must use the default F1 2024 cars provided by the game.
Points will be awarded based on race results.
Intentional collisions or reckless driving will result in penalties.
Drivers must adhere to track limits and regulations.

tournament.name: Strategic Warfare League
rules: Teams must consist of exactly five players.
Matches will be played in competitive mode.
Points will be awarded based on round wins and match results.
Use of cheats or hacks will result in immediate disqualification.

tournament.name: Fantasy Quest
rules: Guilds must have a minimum of 10 members to participate.
Competitions will take place in dungeons and raids.
Points will be awarded based on dungeon completion time and raid progress.
Exploiting game bugs or glitches will result in disqualification.

tournament.name: Virtual Tennis Championship
rules: Players must compete individually.
Matches will be played in a best-of-three sets format.
Points will be awarded based on match results.
Unsportsmanlike conduct will result in penalties.

upcoming.name: Cyberpunk 2077
upcoming.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an upcoming open-world action-adventure game set in the dystopian Night City, developed by CD Projekt Red.

upcoming.name: Elden Ring
upcoming.description: Elden Ring is an upcoming action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

upcoming.name: Starfield
upcoming.description: Starfield is an upcoming role-playing game developed by Bethesda Game Studios set in space.

upcoming.name: God of War: Ragnarok
upcoming.description: God of War: Ragnarok is an upcoming action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio, a sequel to God of War (2018).

upcoming.name: Breath of the Wild 2
upcoming.description: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild 2 is an upcoming action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch.
